name: iWorld Learning (Orchard) - Learn English in Singapore & English course for adults & English for kids

reviews.text: The teachers here have rich teaching experience and know how to motivate the class and create an immersive environment for English learning.  Teacher Jaryl and Lee Ping are very nice teachers. Please come to try if u wanna improve your spoken English.

I got to know about i World Learning through a friend, and I’m really glad I joined! The classes are fun and engaging, and I truly enjoy learning here. Teacher Vanessa is full of energy and creates such a positive and lively classroom atmosphere. Her passion makes every lesson enjoyable and motivating. Highly recommended!
The class environment was really great and the teachers were patient while going through vocabulary and speaking with me as I studied English.

Ms Geeta is very professional , who can explain  difficult vocabularies with simple way , which make us easy to understand. I also love her pronunciation, which is very clear and standard .  The study environment is very cozy and warm . It is a good place to learn .

I searched the social media about the English learning class and the net friends recommended this place . The I  booked a trial class . The teacher can introduce us to the authentic English expressions. Good experience.
